fields.name: Warning:
fields.value:
Do not touch. Paint is still wet.
Attack: None
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Paint a player, disguising them as another role tonight and tomorrow.
> Make your painting come to life, giving your target an ability from the role you disguised them as. They will be able to use it starting the next day or night. This cannot be done two nights in a row.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You may multitask, but both abilities must target the same person.
> Painted players flip as their painted role.
> You cannot make painted Power roles come to life. The host reserves the right to stop any painting from coming to life, instead telling you to pick a different role to make come to life.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose the Town.
